QuestData.Title: A Mage's Knowledge
QuestData.Description:
Ye got some good spells fer a novice mage. Ye might even be as good as I am one day!
But ye don't know Polymorph! How could ye not know that?
Polymorph's one of a mage's most useful spells. I can teach it tae ye, if ye can find me spellbook.
Last I saw, the ogres threw me book in the lake. The LAKE!
Go get me book, and I'll show ye how tae cast Polymorph.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover Meredy Huntswell's book at the bottom of the nearby lake.

Objectives.Objective: Meredy's book recovered from the lake
